mapper.select: SELECT S.REPORTING_DATE, --작성일자 A.ACCOUNT_NAME, --회계계정 J.LEFT_DEBTOR_PRICE, -- 차변금액 J.RIGHT_CREDITS_PRICE, --대변금액 (SELECT C.CUSTOMER_NAME FROM CUSTOMER C WHERE C.CUSTOMER_CODE=J.CUSTOMER_CODE ) CUSTOMER_NAME, --거래처 s.EXPENSE_REPORT -- 적요 FROM SLIP S , JOURNAL J , ACCOUNT A WHERE S.SLIP_NO = J.SLIP_NO AND A.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = #{accountInnerCode} AND S.REPORTING_DATE BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} AND S.SLIP_STATUS = '승인완료' ORDER BY S.REPORTING_DATE
